Articles.Content: Is there a way to add properties to Kerbals or extend them. Something like PartModules for kerbals. I for the mod I'm working on I want to add a part repair experience that is separate from the current kerbal experience system and should only increase if the kerbal takes specific actions.

> 
> KerbalStats?

I would like to add another skill like courage and stupidity but it doesn't seem like there is a way to do this.
